text: Arau musbaraikabilake yetiya sihamtara ansidarasakalaka dekhiba tetiya sihamte ka’ba, ‘he amara raba! Ihamte'i se'isakala loka yisakalaka ami tomara ansi karaichilo, yisakalaka ami tomara paraibarte ahbana karaichilo’; tetiya ansisakale e'i katha musbaraikasakalara pine ubhata'i di ka’ba, ‘niscaya tomaloka michaliya’
